pullrequest.title: Fix HIDPI issue with GLWidget window size.

content.raw: Yep yep, wasn't sure if that was much of a cross-platform solution.  Maybe it's more of an OGRE bug?  Anyone else on Ubuntu experiencing this issue?  I'll try to get a screenshot as soon as it finishes compiling, and I'll do a bit of testing for mouse picking.
content.html: Yep yep, wasn't sure if that was much of a cross-platform solution. Maybe it's more of an OGRE bug? Anyone else on Ubuntu experiencing this issue? I'll try to get a screenshot as soon as it finishes compiling, and I'll do a bit of testing for mouse picking.
